identity.name: DownPricer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion of raw marketplace urgency and sterile enterprise precision. Two worlds, one app.

marketplace_headings.usage: Product titles, prices, promo banners. Tight tracking.

admin_headings.usage: Dashboard widgets, table headers. Normal tracking.

rules: MARKETPLACE: Headings must be uppercase or tight-tracking for impact.
ADMIN: Headings must be sentence case and highly legible.
PRICES: Use 'Outfit' font, weight 700, tracking-tight. Example: text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight text-orange-500.

usage_rules: ADMIN: Use Blue (#3b82f6) for links and primary actions.
ADMIN: Use Slate-900 (#0f172a) for navigation and headers.
NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

spacing_system.philosophy: Marketplace uses generous padding (p-6, p-8) for touch targets. Admin uses tight padding (p-2, p-4) for data density.

grids.marketplace_listing: grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6. Mobile: grid-cols-2 gap-3.
grids.admin_dashboard: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Dense layout.
grids.bento_grid: Use for 'Featured' or 'Categories'. Mix col-span-2 and row-span-2 items.

buttons.marketplace_primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white font-bold rounded-full px-6 py-3 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(249,115,22,0.4)] transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.admin_primary: bg-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-800 text-white font-medium rounded-md px-4 py-2 shadow-sm

cards.marketplace_product: bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-colors group relative
cards.admin_widget: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm p-4

inputs.style: bg-background border-input ring-offset-background placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
inputs.admin_variant: bg-white border-slate-300 focus:border-blue-500 rounded-md h-9 text-sm

badges.status_pending: bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 border-orange-200 (Admin) / bg-orange-500/20 text-orange-400 border-orange-500/50 (Marketplace)
badges.status_success: bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200 (Admin) / bg-green-500/20 text-green-400 border-green-500/50 (Marketplace)
badges.status_error: bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200 (Admin) / bg-red-500/20 text-red-400 border-red-500/50 (Marketplace)

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay on Marketplace backgrounds to avoid 'flat digital' look.

hero_backgrounds.description: Dark mode sneakers, high contrast, perfect for 'Price Drop' hero.
Red illuminated headphones, fits the 'Alert/Red' theme.

admin_visuals.description: Clean, white, minimalist office. Good for Admin Login side panel.
Abstract blue data lines. Good for 'S-Plan' or 'Analytics' promo cards.

instructions_to_main_agent.theme_implementation: You MUST implement a route-based theme switcher. If path starts with '/admin' or '/seller' or '/s-plan', use the ADMIN THEME (Light). If path is public or '/client', use the MARKETPLACE THEME (Dark). You can achieve this by adding a 'dark' class to a wrapper div for marketplace routes, and removing it for admin routes.
instructions_to_main_agent.mobile_first: Always write mobile styles first (e.g., 'grid-cols-1') and then add breakpoints ('md:grid-cols-3').
instructions_to_main_agent.performance: Use 'loading="lazy"' on all images. Use 'next/image' or optimized 'img' tags with width/height.
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. Orange on White is tricky - check APCA. Use darker orange for text, brighter for backgrounds.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element. Format: 'page-section-element-action'. Example: 'login-form-email-input', 'product-card-buy-button'.

universal_guidelines.component_reuse: Check /app/frontend/src/components/ui before creating new ones. Customize them via props or className, do not duplicate logic.
